column1: # AFDX Virtual Link Table — BWB-Q100 IMA

# - Max_L2_Bytes: Ethernet L2 bytes incl. headers/FCS (≤1518)
# - Redundancy: A/B means dual network (both nets active)
# Add more VLs below; one row per unidirectional VL. BW ≈ Frames_per_BAG*Max_L2_Bytes*8/BAG_ms (kbps)
